pin.title: PIN
pin.description: Configured PIN for Homebridge devices. This enables fetching/controlling Homebridge accessories.

awsRegion.title: AWS Region
awsRegion.description: AWS Region where IoT will be synced.

awsIamAccessKey.title: AWS IAM Access Key
awsIamAccessKey.description: IAM access key for user. Create from AWS console.

awsIamSecret.title: AWS IAM Secret
awsIamSecret.description: IAM secret for user. Create from AWS console.

iotIdentifier.title: AWS IOT Identifier
iotIdentifier.description: IOT identifier. Thing names (and thus MQTT topics) will be prefixed with this key. If using with AWS Cognito, this should be the Cognito user name.

iotEndpoint.title: AWS IOT Endpoint
iotEndpoint.description: IOT MQTT endpoint. Find on AWS IoT Console.

deviceFilterList.title: Device Filter List
deviceFilterList.description: Specify the names of devices to be enabled
